Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/bin/rsync /opt/bin/rsync
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/bin/rsync-ssl /opt/bin/rsync-ssl
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man5
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man5/rsyncd.conf.5 /opt/share/man/man5/rsyncd.conf.5
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man1/rsync-ssl.1 /opt/share/man/man1/rsync-ssl.1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man1/rsync.1 /opt/share/man/man1/rsync.1
